headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Genpact (G) Being Named a Leader in AI-Driven Finance Outsourcing
summary: Genpact was recently recognized as both a Leader and Star Performer in the Everest Group Finance & Accounting Outsourcing PEAK Matrix Assessment 2025, highlighting its AI-first strategy, agentic AI capabilities, and innovation through its AI Gigafactory and AP Suite in finance operations modernization. This recognition, which emphasizes Genpact's consulting-led transformation and large-scale client impact, reinforces the company's leadership position in accelerating AI adoption for global...
